# Copilot Instructions for Chalet Management

This is a chalet management software project created to help manage a family business.

## Project Context
- **Purpose**: Software to manage chalet rentals, bookings, and related business operations
- **Target User**: Small business owner (family business)
- **Development Approach**: AI-assisted development

## General Guidelines
- Write clear, maintainable code that can be easily understood
- Prioritize user-friendly features for small business management
- Keep the solution simple and practical for the use case
- Consider that the end user may not be highly technical

## Code Standards
- Follow industry best practices for the chosen technology stack
- Write self-documenting code with clear variable and function names
- Add comments only when necessary to explain complex business logic
- Ensure proper error handling and validation

## Key Features to Support
- Chalet/property management
- Booking and reservation system
- Customer information management
- Financial tracking and reporting
- Calendar and availability management

## When Making Changes
- Consider the impact on the small business workflow
- Ensure changes are backwards compatible when possible
- Test thoroughly before deployment
- Document any user-facing changes clearly
